item.title: AKR4C14;OsI_04428
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g62870 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0847700 Gene Symbol: AKR4C14 OsI_04428 OsAKR2 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: Bmr2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sb04g005210 Gene Symbol: Bmr2 Gene Name: Brown midrib2 Genome: Species: Sorghum bicolor Functional Descriptions: Brown midrib2 (Bmr2) encodes the major 4-coumarate:coenzymeA ligase involved in lignin biosynthesis in sorghum.

item.title: CaAIPP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaAIPP1 Gene Name: protein phosphatase 2C 37 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Functional analysis of the pepper protein phosphatase, CaAIPP1, and its interacting partner CaAIRF1: Modulation of ABA signalling and the drought stress response.

item.title: GhYGL1d
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CotAD_30325 Gene Symbol: GhYGL1d Gene Name: YELLOW-GREEN LEAF Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhYGL1d, a pentatricopeptide repeat protein, is required for chloroplast development in cotton.

item.title: Gl8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb246270 Gene Symbol: Gl8 Gene Name: glossy8 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: GmFTL2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmFTL2 Gene Name: Glycine max flowering locus T-like protein 2 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmFTL2 expression is regulated by developmental and tissue-specific clues and plays roles in seedling establishment and the development of microgametophytes, embryos, and roots.

item.title: TaEXPA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaEXPA1 Gene Name: Expansin gene1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Expansin genes play important roles in the regulation of cell size, as well as organ size.

item.title: VviEDR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VviEDR1 Gene Name: ENHANCED DISEASE RESISTANCE1 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: Chimeric mutations in grapevine ENHANCED DISEASE RESISTANCE1 improve resistance to powdery mildew without growth penalty.
